thread.title: Moms boycott American Girl dolls after underwear change | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Moms boycott American Girl dolls after underwear change | Daily Mail Online

author: Carly Stern For Dailymail.Com
title: Moms boycott American Girl dolls after underwear change | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad 'We WILL NOT purchase any dolls with permanent underwear': Angry parents threaten to boycott American Girl after the company announced new dolls will come with panties sewn on The doll company said this week that some new dolls will now come with smaller underwear that will be sewn to the dolls' cloth bodies Because it is permanent, they promised that the underwear should fit easily under all clothes and even bathing suits However, some mothers expressed outrage and promised to stop buying American Girl products Published: 20:54 GMT, 9 February 2017 | Updated: 20:54 GMT, 9 February 2017 60 shares
